name: Nimble Foot
description:
This is a ninja parkour platformer game, where your spacebar is broken. It is made in 58 hours for the Backtrace gamejam 3. This is a puzzle platformer where you cannot jump, but you get a jump bar, that forces you to jump every now and then, so you have to time it.

  Try to collect as much red stars as possible. There are 3 in each level and 5 in the 5th level.

The full instructions can be found in the instructions page of the game.

  More about me: I'm Tricky, I'm a passionate Programmer, Gamer, Gamedev, and I love doing CTFs :D

Have fun! :D
